verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went on his <S%H5375>journey,<s%> <S%H7272><s%> and <S%H1980>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>people<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7257>lying<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H875>well<s%> they <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks:<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And <S%H8033>thither<s%> were <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> <S%H622>gathered:<s%> and they <S%H1556>rolled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> again <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, My <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> be <S%H859>ye?<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Of <S%H4480>Haran<s%> <S%H2771><s%> are <S%H587>we.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3045>Know<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor?<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H3045>know<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Is he <S%H7965>well?<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> He is <S%H7965>well:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Lo,<s%> it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is it <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> should be gathered <S%H622>together:<s%> <S%H8248>water<s%> ye the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> them.

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H3808>cannot,<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> be gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> and till they <S%H1556>roll<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> then we <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

And while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them, <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H7462>kept<s%> them.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H1556>rolled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H7259>Rebekah's<s%> <S%H1121>son:<s%> and she <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H1>father.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8088>tidings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%> And he <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H6106>bone<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%> And he <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him the <S%H3117>space<s%> of a <S%H2320>month.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H251>brother,<s%> shouldest thou therefore <S%H5647>serve<s%> me for <S%H2600>naught?<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>what<s%> shall thy <S%H4909>wages<s%> be?

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>elder<s%> was <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H6996>younger<s%> was <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%>
Leah <S%H3812><s%> was <S%H7390>tender<s%> <S%H5869>eyed;<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H8389><s%> and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> thy <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H2896>better<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> her to thee, than that I should <S%H4480>give<s%> <S%H5414><s%> her to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man:<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel;<s%> and they <S%H1961>seemed<s%> <S%H5869><s%> unto him but a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for the <S%H160>love<s%> he had to her.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> my <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> that I may go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> that he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her <S%H413>to<s%> him; and he went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> his <S%H8198>maid<s%> for a <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H3812>Leah:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto me? did <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee for <S%H7354>Rachel?<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then hast thou <S%H7411>beguiled<s%> me?

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It must <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> in our <S%H4725>country,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1067>firstborn.<s%>

Fulfill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H2063>her<s%> <S%H7620>week,<s%> and we will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> <S%H2063>her<s%> <S%H7620>week:<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%> also.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to be her <S%H8198>maid.<s%>

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> more than <S%H4480>Leah,<s%> <S%H3812><s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> was <S%H8130>hated,<s%> he <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7358>womb:<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H6135>barren.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon my <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3588>therefore<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will <S%H157>love<s%> me.

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> was <S%H8130>hated,<s%> he hath therefore <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> son <S%H1571>also:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> this <S%H6471>time<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> be <S%H3867>joined<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> was his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son:<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6471>Now<s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and <S%H5975>left<s%> <S%H4480>bearing.<s%> <S%H3205><s%>
